## Background

::: {layout="[[1,1], [1]]"}
![](images/Photo.png)

**Jiatong Liu** is a recent graduate with a Bachelor of Science degree in Agriculture Resource and Economics and a minor in Statistics from the University of Maryland. She is currently pursuing a Master's degree in data science and analytics at Georgetown University, driven by a clear career goal of becoming a Data Scientist, with a specific focus on opportunities in the DMV (Washington, D.C., Maryland, and Virginia) area.

Throughout her academic journey, Jiatong has honed her practical skills and knowledge through a series of enriching internships. Her most recent role as a Data Analyst Intern at Guotai Junan Securities Co., Ltd. (06/2022 - 08/2022) showcased her exceptional capabilities in data retrieval, overseas investment information collection, research report organization, and the application of mathematical models in R for analyzing financial market data. This experience has endowed her with a robust foundation in data analysis, statistical modeling, and financial research, positioning her well for her future career pursuits.In addition to her internships, Jiatong undertook a significant individual project titled ["Assessing the Relationship Between Aviation Kerosene Price and Demand for Air Transportation"](Memo%202.pdf) during the spring of 2022. In this project, she collected extensive data from reputable sources, rigorously cleaned and prepared datasets to ensure data quality and coherence, and conducted three distict visual analyses. Jiatong employed advanced data visualization techniques to uncover the patterns and trends within the aviation kerosene price dynamics and its consequential effects on the ebb and flow of air transportation demand. This project not only highlighted Jiatong's proficiency in data collection, preparation, and statistical analysis but also underscored her capacity to tackle complex research questions with diligence and sophistication, reinforcing her foundation in data-driven decision-making.

:::
